text: School of the Arts and Architecture
School of Theater, Film and Television
Our faculty are Nobel Prize winners, MacArthur Fellows, and recipients of the Fields Medal and Turing Award.

They are groundbreaking researchers, innovative scientists, life-changing physicians and world-renowned authorities in just about every field of endeavor. And there are 4,300 of them on our campus. Most importantly, they don't just teach about the world — they demonstrate how to impact it.
